DOC.brief_title: Specific Enteral Nutrition Malnourished , Dialysis Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease . Efficacy , Safety , Quality Life
DOC.criteria: Chronic kidney disease patient hemodialysis least 3 month , minimum three hemodialysis session 4 hour per week Patients age 18 year Written , free inform consent give Patient Patient insure social security system equivalent Patients receive enteral nutrition 3 month precede inclusion ; take oral nutritional supplement , perdialytic parenteral nutrition total parenteral nutrition criterion noninclusion Patient state malnutrition define presence least 3 5 follow criterion : weight loss great 10 % observe last six month serum albumin < 35 g / l serum Prealbumin < 300 mg / l BMI < 20 NPNA < 1 g / kg / day 2 consecutive month present food intake < 20 kcal / kg / day failure nutritional care method , namely , oral nutritional supplement / peridialytic parenteral nutrition , total parenteral nutrition lack compliance one month , nutritional care method mention . • Patients decision prescribe enteral feed previously take Patients history intolerance enteral feed Index Kt/Veq ( balance ) < = 1.2 index Kt/Vsp ( single pool ) < = 1.4 accord method use Patients disease compromise shortterm ( 46 month ) prognosis ( cancer disease terminal phase ) Pregnant Patient Patient know allergy least one following : milk protein , soy , fish Patient whose digestive tract functional patient shock Patient protect guardianship Patient exclusion period participation another clinical trial .
